Boltund

Type HP Attack Defense Speed Special Attack Special Defense Total
69 90 60 121 90 60 490
#62 0' 3.9"
75.06 lbs. 		Dog Pokémon This Pokémon generates electricity and channels it into its legs to keep them going strong. Boltund can run nonstop for three full days.

Ability Learnset

By leveling up

Level Ability Score Description
1 Ball Fetch 1 If the Pokémon is not holding an item, it will fetch the first failed thrown Poké Ball.
10 Electromorphosis 2 The Pokémon becomes Charged up when it takes damage.
25 Rattled 4 Dark-, Ghost-, and Bug-type moves scare the Pokémon and boost its Speed stat.
40 Competitive 7 Boosts the Sp. Atk stat sharply when a stat is lowered.
55 Strong Jaw 7 The Pokémon's strong jaw boosts the power of its biting moves.
70 Stamina 7 Boosts the Defense stat when hit by an attack.
85 Fluffy 6 Halves the damage taken from contact moves, but doubles that of Fire-type moves.
100 Surge Surfer 6 Doubles the Pokémon's Speed stat on Electric Terrain.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By Disc

Disc Ability Score Description
Disc 02 Pickup 2 The Pokémon may pick up the items, both during and outside of battle.
Disc 07 Illuminate 5 Raises the Pokémon's evasiveness.
Disc 11 Ball Fetch 1 If the Pokémon is not holding an item, it will fetch the first failed thrown Poké Ball.
Disc 15 Lightning Rod 7 The Pokémon draws in and neutralises Electric-type moves, boosting its Sp. Atk.
Disc 33 Strong Jaw 7 The Pokémon's strong jaw boosts the power of its biting moves.
Disc 46 Flare Boost 6 Powers up special attacks when the Pokémon is burned.
Disc 47 Frost Boost 6 Powers up special attacks when the Pokémon is frostbitten.
Disc 48 Oblivious 3 The Pokémon is oblivious, and that keeps it from being infatuated or taunted.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By tutoring

Ability Score Description
Battery 2 Powers up ally Pokémon's special moves.
Cute Charm 4 Contact with the Pokémon may cause infatuation.
Defeatist -2 Halves the Pokémon's Attack and Sp. Atk stats when its HP becomes half or less.
Electromorphosis 2 The Pokémon becomes Charged up when it takes damage.
Fluffy 6 Halves the damage taken from contact moves, but doubles that of Fire-type moves.
Friend Guard 2 Reduces damage done to allies.
Fur Coat 9 Halves the damage from physical moves.
Galvanize 8 Normal-type moves become Electric-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Gluttony 3 Makes the Pokémon already eat a held Berry when its HP drops to half or less.
Guard Dog 8 Boosts Attack if intimidated. Effects that force switching out also fail to work against it.
Klutz -2 The Pokémon can't use any held items.
Mimicry 3 Changes the Pokémon's type depending on the terrain.
Motor Drive 7 Boosts its Speed stat if hit by an Electric-type move instead of taking damage.
Own Tempo 4 This Pokémon has its own tempo, and that prevents it from becoming confused.
Rattled 4 Dark-, Ghost-, and Bug-type moves scare the Pokémon and boost its Speed stat.
Rivalry 3 Deals more damage to Pokémon of the same gender, but less to those of the opposite gender.
Run Away 1 Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.
Slow Start -5 For five turns, the Pokémon's Attack and Speed stats are halved.
Static 5 The Pokémon is charged with static electricity, so contact with it may cause paralysis.
Surge Surfer 6 Doubles the Pokémon's Speed stat on Electric Terrain.
Transistor 4 Powers up Electric-type moves.
Truant -5 The Pokémon can't use a move if it had used a move on the previous turn.
Volt Absorb 8 Restores HP if hit by an Electric-type move instead of taking damage.
Volt Rush 6 Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in a thunderstorm.
Competitive 7 Boosts the Sp. Atk stat sharply when a stat is lowered.
Electric Surge 9 Turns the ground into Electric Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
Emergency Exit 4 The Pokémon, sensing danger, switches out when its HP becomes half or less.
Hustle 7 Boosts the Attack stat, but lowers accuracy.
Inner Focus 3 The Pokémon's intensely focused, and that protects the Pokémon from flinching.
Quick Feet 6 Boosts the Speed stat if the Pokémon has a status condition.
Reckless 7 Powers up moves that have recoil damage.
Speed Boost 9 Its Speed stat is boosted every turn.
Stamina 7 Boosts the Defense stat when hit by an attack.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled
